mdRecord.dcterms:title: Leges anglo-saxonicæ ecclesiasticæ & civiles: Accedunt leges Edvardi latinæ, Guilielmi Conquestoris gallo-normannicæ, et Henrici I. latinæ. Subjungitur domini Henr. Spelmanni Codex legum veterum statutorum regni angliæ, quæ ab ingressu Guilielmi I. usque ad annum nonum Henr. III. edita sunt. Toti operi præmittitur Dissertatio epistolaris admodum reverendi domini Guilielmi Nicolsoni episcopi derrensis de jure feudali veterum saxonum / Cum codd. mss. contulit, notas. versionem & glossarium adjecit David Wilkins
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilkins, David, 1685-1745
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: typis G. Bowyer, impensis R. Gosling
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law, Anglo-Saxon
Law--Great Britain
Ecclesiastical law--Great Britain
Feudal law--Great Britain
